    public static class Grammar.CharToken.Composed
extends Grammar.CharToken

    • Constructor Detail

      • Composed

        public Composed(CharRange charRange,
                List<Grammar.Rule> charTokens,
                BiFunction<CharRange,CharRange[],CharRange> composition)
        Create composable char token.
        Parameters:
        charRange - The actual char range.
        charTokens - The others tokens, MUST be or wrap char tokens.
        composition - Indicates whether to compose by union or exclusion.
        See Also:
        CharRange.union(CharRange...), CharRange.except(CharRange...)
